summary: This is an email chain from March 11, 2019, discussing the status of an investigation into Jeffrey Epstein, including a memo being drafted, the applicability of a prior Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA), and the status of three victims, with only one potentially cooperative new victim in New York.

events.title: Email discussion on investigation status
events.description: An email exchange discussing the drafting of a memo regarding the Epstein investigation, the legal issue of a prior Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA), and the status of three victims.

keyFacts: A memo was being drafted on March 11, 2019, regarding the Epstein investigation, covering background, status update, and the legal issue of a prior Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA).
There were three victims identified in the investigation, but two had been approached and were uncooperative.
Only one potentially cooperative new victim in New York was available at the time of the email.
